name: Report a documentation bug
about: Report an issue with the Infisical documentation.
title: 'Docs: '
labels: documentation
assignees: ''
body:
  - type: textarea
    attributes:
      label: What is the documentation issue?
      description: 'Example: There is typo in this sentence.'
    validations:
      required: true
  - type: textarea
    attributes:
      label: Is there any context that might help us understand?
      description: A clear description of any added context that might help us understand.
    validations:
      required: true
  - type: input
    attributes:
      label: Does the docs page already exist? Please link to it.
      description: 'Example: https://infisical.com/docs/documentation/getting-started/overview'
    validations:
      required: false
